mapper.select: SELECT TIME_CD_MGR_ID , TENANT_ID , ENTER_CD , TIME_CD , TIME_NM , SYMD , EYMD , WORK_SHM , WORK_EHM , HOL_YN , HOL_TIME_CD_MGR_ID , LATE_CHK_YN , LEAVE_CHK_YN , ABSENCE_CHK_YN , NOTE , UPDATE_DATE , UPDATE_ID FROM WTM_TIME_CD_MGR WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND #{ymd} BETWEEN SYMD AND F_WTM_NVL(EYMD, '99991231') ORDER BY SYMD, TIME_CD
mapper.update: INSERT INTO WTM_TIME_CD_MGR (TENANT_ID, ENTER_CD, TIME_CD, TIME_NM, SYMD, EYMD, WORK_SHM, WORK_EHM, HOL_YN, HOL_TIME_CD_MGR_ID, LATE_CHK_YN, LEAVE_CHK_YN, ABSENCE_CHK_YN, NOTE, UPDATE_ID) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{enterCd} , #{timeCd} , #{timeNm} , #{symd} , #{eymd} , #{workShm} , #{workEhm} , #{holYn} , #{holTimeCdMgrId}, #{lateChkYn} , #{leaveChkYn} , #{absenceChkYn} , #{note} , #{userId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TIME_NM = VALUES(TIME_NM), EYMD = VALUES(EYMD), WORK_SHM = VALUES(WORK_SHM), WORK_EHM = VALUES(WORK_EHM), HOL_YN = VALUES(HOL_YN), HOL_TIME_CD_MGR_ID = VALUES(HOL_TIME_CD_MGR_ID), LATE_CHK_YN = VALUES(LATE_CHK_YN), LEAVE_CHK_YN = VALUES(LEAVE_CHK_YN), ABSENCE_CHK_YN = VALUES(ABSENCE_CHK_YN), NOTE = VALUES(NOTE), UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), UPDATE_ID = VALUES(UPDATE_ID)
